title: Drawing, Cornelia, Mother of Gracchi; Socrates, Alcibiades and Aspasia; Zeus and the Maidens of Crotone
title_raw: Cornelia, Mother of Gracchi; Socrates, Alcibiades and Aspasia; Zeus and the Maidens of Crotone
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: Corneglia madre dei crachi e la damma capovana; aspasia Socrate alcibiade Fidia Pericle; un grego Filosofo per non far torto nella sielta di tre donne le piglia tutte.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Cornelia, Mother of Gracchi; Socrates, Alcibiades and Aspasia; Zeus and the Maidens of Crotone. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2705
